content.question: Which of the following is the most likely explanation for the way in which the artist chose to portray Empress Maria Theresa?

choices.label: The artist wished to show her as an absolutist ruler of her diverse empire.
The artist wished to question the fitness of women to rule as monarchs.
The artist wished to stress Neoclassical ideals of public participation and citizenship.
The artist was primarily influenced by Mannerist techniques emphasizing distortion to create dramatic effects.

content.answer: The artist wished to show her as an absolutist ruler of her diverse empire.
